abstracts.cdata!:
The project objective was to conduct a
            Strategic Environmental Assessment on the Tourism sector to
            consider promotion of policies adopted within institutional
            and legal frameworks. The project also dealt with the
            development of tourism and the potential impacts and the
            manner in which to incorporate the environmental dimension
            in the development model of tourism. The study demonstrated
            that in the last two decades the tourism industry in Mexico
            has grown significantly to become one of the largest in the
            world. This growth is due in large part to the development
            approach infrastructure that has been used, which is
            strictly aligned with market demand within the national and
            international tourist scene.
